title: boiss i need your help
body: so i bought the chaos path that is was around 10$ worth of rp, basically ive done all the missions and i have the nightbringer border and icon,but i dont  have the actual skin so that means when the event ends if i buy the nightbringer in a few months i will not receive the skin border?,,, please i need help im really worried {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: No worries! You can still buy the skin after the event ends and have the border activated.
